item,phasetype,survey,max_time,notes,condition,text,shuffle_1,task_title,task_body_text,weight,stimuli_number, 0,uor_cover,,user,,,Welcome,,../../collector-experiments/User/Assets/MSc/cover_zoom_in.css,,0,, 0,task_bookend,,,,,Start,,üéÖ Christmas Word Search 1 ü§∂,"

Welcome to the first of three Christmas word search.

On the next screen you will see a grid of letters. Within that grid, there are 15 hidden words, themed around Christmas. A list of the hidden words is displayed to the right of the grid. Words can go left-to-right, up-to-down, and diagonally, they may also share letters with another word. When you find an word, use your mouse to click and drag across the corresponding letters (a yellow block-line will appear where you drag). If you correctly identify a hidden word, the block-line will turn green and remain in place (and the word will be crossed off the list)

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the grid indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Please note: each grid and word list is dynamically when the word search starts. This may result in a minor pause before the grid appear. Also, please be aware, no data regarding who many words you find is being recorded.



",0,, 0,wordsearch_v2,,,,,"CHRISTMAS,MERRY,FESTIVE,ELVES,JOLLY,REINDEER,CAROLS,MISTLETOE,FRANKINCENSE,MYRRH,NATIVITY,YULETIDE,TINSEL,STOCKING,PRESENTS,RUDOLPH,SLEIGH,SCROOGE,SNOW,GINGERBREAD,ADVENT,ANGEL,BELLS,BLITZEN,CARDS,CHESTNUT,CHOCOLATE,ANGELS,COAL,DECEMBER,DECORATIONS,BAUBLE,EPIPHANY,FROST,HOLIDAY,ICICLE,JINGLE,GRINCH,SLED,NUTCRACKER,MINCEPIES,WREATH,JUMPERS,BELLS,KRAMPUS",,,,0,15, 0,task_bookend,,,,,Start,,üéÑ Christmas Word Search 2 üéÅ,"

If you correctly identify a hidden word, the block-line will turn green and remain in place (and the word will be crossed off the list)

You have 5 minutes to find as many words as you can. A sliding timer bar below the grid indicates how long you have left. If you find all the words before the time is up, the task will automatically end.

When you are ready, please press Start below to begin. Good luck!

Please note: each grid and word list is dynamically when the word search starts. This may result in a minor pause before the grid appear. Also, please be aware, no data regarding who many words you find is being recorded.



",0,, 0,wordsearch_v2,,,,,,,,,0,15, 0,task_bookend,,,,,Start,,üõ∑ Christmas Word Search 3 ‚õÑ,"
